qas.question: What quality of the PS3 Super Slim was the website Spong excited about?
In addition to quieter fans and drive, what change from the other models did Spong praise?
What piece of the PS3 Super Slim's hardware did Spong say was too "fiddly"?
What did Spong said you have to do to the disc loader before the console will start reading the disc?
What quality of the PS2 Super Slim was the website Spong excited about?
In addition to louder fans and drive, what change from the other models did Spong praise?
What piece of the PS2 Super Slim's hardware did Spong say was too "fiddly"?
What did Spong said you have to not do to the disc loader before the console will start reading the disc?
What did Spong said you have to do to the disc loader before the console will stop reading the disc?

context: The Super Slim model of PS3 has received positive reviews. Gaming website Spong praised the new Super Slim's <a0_0><b4_0>quietness<b4_0/><a0_0/>, stating "The most noticeable noise comes when the drive seeks a new area of the disc, such as when starting to load a game, and this occurs infrequently." They added that the fans are quieter than that of Slim, and went on to praise the new <a1_0><b5_0>smaller, lighter size<b5_0/><a1_0/>. Criticism was placed on the new <a2_0><b6_0>disc loader<b6_0/><a2_0/>, stating: "The cover can be moved by hand if you wish, there's also an eject button to do the work for you, but there is no software eject from the triangle button menus in the Xross Media Bar (XMB) interface. In addition, you have to <b7_0><b8_0>close the cover<b8_0/><b7_0/> by hand, which can be a bit fiddly if it's upright, and the PS3 won't start reading a disc unless you do [<a3_0>close the cover<a3_0/>]." They also said there is no real drop in retail price.
